author: Stephen Fidler
title: Trade and Tech in Focus at WSJ CEO Council in London
text:
LONDON—U.S. and European policy makers and senior executives of major tech and financial businesses are set to gather in London on Thursday in the first meeting of The Wall Street Journal’s CEO Council to be held in Europe.
Top executives at the invitation-only gathering will meet against a positive backdrop as the world’s big economies grow in unison, but as their companies face the prospect of significant disruption from shifts in geopolitics and the accelerating technology revolution.
...
